Overview
========

``atsphinx-revealjs-rtd`` is Sphinx extension for sphinx-revealjs.

This provides Reveal.js plugin to append features for presentation on Read the Docs hosting.
It will raise your motivation to manage presentation on RTD.

Refs
====

- `Demo(Japanese) <https://https://atsphinx-revealjs-rtd.readthedocs.io/stable/>`_
- https://sphinx-revealjs.readthedocs.io/
